name: Alien Rush (abergmann, DARG8, Janku, Marowgo)
description:
Alien Rush is tower defense game based on distant planet, where you will fight for survival of your race as enemies try to flood your base!

Put towers and pay with resources gathered from enemies!
Press "F" to switch between free roam and tactical camera!

And most importantly - enjoy your fight, soldier!

***
TURRET COSTS:
1. Rocket turret - 18 coins
2. Rail turret - 10 coins
3. Hummer - 20 coins
